# BFSI Demo

## Core Banking Service

### Sample Requests

#### POST /cc/auth
```
curl -X 'POST' \
  'https://b48cc93e-fa33-4420-a155-bc653b4d46be-my-env.e1-us-east-azure.choreoapis.dev/corebanking/corebankingservice/v1.0/cc/auth' \
  -H 'accept: application/json' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'api-key: eyJraWQiOiJnYXRld2F5X2NlcnRpZmljYXRlX2FsaWFzIiwiYWxnIjoiUlMyNTYifQ..crWFvrxuHfzSzJUIodgHUaLYRNr30EyM5WRHjGtzMhEzSufcGHyPxLXhYPrhAIKDSvi9hzCS52r2l29Udyao5slw-ez0H5n00jVARXz18UpKZqqy4EeEpcjNRCepwdOQHA0Gb_jNZFWpjhmc9vHbNyB6wt1vhYwQ3BR6aMrCJV3y3NJr51lystLJ-kXmKLTa-0GqB_PwNbOibxy73gzJEfrDxOZD4YHhr2Ql-IHSvgUVd4_Ccia8kiV7HJMWk-jVJ92kh0iLbmqZfaYhqAx8CzpAoQlTVAc86jr4gH-dcZ7zX-32YS8skLRg1J7WGfu-IhWsM1YtfXWQ00uoKbfdt8DQkKtVp3rma1SyJD-LqkynxHDC0G_Hdm0I6doR7_mNJJZaKkdON8eRXiP_z_bypsFNhHVBnsNYnyJcxh3m6LcMOkyCh_xx2ub7f2VrdtZ50p1HHOqMtwHQLQO9ImHtRiZebZrph2ksWRU1zWWDxuctZW6ydyTI8choV4n3kcvaFh0nBYSGE16bnwJrLlLc2hC5EjWMxOSxB7Ht1F1Pmbd7pZ1FHWWlsGF4-YYtVhJ1Adul-G28JnJ80mko2fOWUB3B_rVYSBZfsCKQDgz8ERpMv55e5Y3kMFb4-fIpqz5zLDZQcfZgTzbgailYBokq6VibjXbPPAB2LjaYP8Q-VIM' \
  -d '  {
    "merchant_id": "MERCHANT123",
    "merchant_name": "John Doe",
    "email": "dharanes8@gmail.com",
    "social_security_number":"123-45-6789",
    "card_number": "1234-5678-9012-3456"
  }'
```

#### GET /credit_rating
```
curl -X 'GET' \
  'https://b48cc93e-fa33-4420-a155-bc653b4d46be-my-env.e1-us-east-azure.choreoapis.dev/corebanking/corebankingservice/v1.0/credit_rating?user_id=1234567891' \
  -H 'accept: application/json' \
  -H 'api-key: eyJraWQiOiJnYXRld2F5X2NlcnRpZmljYXRlX2FsaWFzIiwiYWxnIjoiUlMyNTYifQ..crWFvrxuHfzSzJUIodgHUaLYRNr30EyM5WRHjGtzMhEzSufcGHyPxLXhYPrhAIKDSvi9hzCS52r2l29Udyao5slw-ez0H5n00jVARXz18UpKZqqy4EeEpcjNRCepwdOQHA0Gb_jNZFWpjhmc9vHbNyB6wt1vhYwQ3BR6aMrCJV3y3NJr51lystLJ-kXmKLTa-0GqB_PwNbOibxy73gzJEfrDxOZD4YHhr2Ql-IHSvgUVd4_Ccia8kiV7HJMWk-jVJ92kh0iLbmqZfaYhqAx8CzpAoQlTVAc86jr4gH-dcZ7zX-32YS8skLRg1J7WGfu-IhWsM1YtfXWQ00uoKbfdt8DQkKtVp3rma1SyJD-LqkynxHDC0G_Hdm0I6doR7_mNJJZaKkdON8eRXiP_z_bypsFNhHVBnsNYnyJcxh3m6LcMOkyCh_xx2ub7f2VrdtZ50p1HHOqMtwHQLQO9ImHtRiZebZrph2ksWRU1zWWDxuctZW6ydyTI8choV4n3kcvaFh0nBYSGE16bnwJrLlLc2hC5EjWMxOSxB7Ht1F1Pmbd7pZ1FHWWlsGF4-YYtVhJ1Adul-G28JnJ80mko2fOWUB3B_rVYSBZfsCKQDgz8ERpMv55e5Y3kMFb4-fIpqz5zLDZQcfZgTzbgailYBokq6VibjXbPPAB2LjaYP8Q-VIM'
```

#### GET /users/search
```
curl -X 'GET' \
  'https://b48cc93e-fa33-4420-a155-bc653b4d46be-my-env.e1-us-east-azure.choreoapis.dev/corebanking/corebankingservice/v1.0/users/search?first_name=John&last_name=Doe&social_security_number=123-45-6789' \
  -H 'accept: application/json' \
  -H 'api-key: eyJraWQiOiJnYXRld2F5X2NlcnRpZmljYXRlX2FsaWFzIiwiYWxnIjoiUlMyNTYifQ..crWFvrxuHfzSzJUIodgHUaLYRNr30EyM5WRHjGtzMhEzSufcGHyPxLXhYPrhAIKDSvi9hzCS52r2l29Udyao5slw-ez0H5n00jVARXz18UpKZqqy4EeEpcjNRCepwdOQHA0Gb_jNZFWpjhmc9vHbNyB6wt1vhYwQ3BR6aMrCJV3y3NJr51lystLJ-kXmKLTa-0GqB_PwNbOibxy73gzJEfrDxOZD4YHhr2Ql-IHSvgUVd4_Ccia8kiV7HJMWk-jVJ92kh0iLbmqZfaYhqAx8CzpAoQlTVAc86jr4gH-dcZ7zX-32YS8skLRg1J7WGfu-IhWsM1YtfXWQ00uoKbfdt8DQkKtVp3rma1SyJD-LqkynxHDC0G_Hdm0I6doR7_mNJJZaKkdON8eRXiP_z_bypsFNhHVBnsNYnyJcxh3m6LcMOkyCh_xx2ub7f2VrdtZ50p1HHOqMtwHQLQO9ImHtRiZebZrph2ksWRU1zWWDxuctZW6ydyTI8choV4n3kcvaFh0nBYSGE16bnwJrLlLc2hC5EjWMxOSxB7Ht1F1Pmbd7pZ1FHWWlsGF4-YYtVhJ1Adul-G28JnJ80mko2fOWUB3B_rVYSBZfsCKQDgz8ERpMv55e5Y3kMFb4-fIpqz5zLDZQcfZgTzbgailYBokq6VibjXbPPAB2LjaYP8Q-VIM'
```

## Fraud Risk Management Service

### Sample Requests

#### POST /validate
```
curl -X 'POST' \
  'https://b48cc93e-fa33-4420-a155-bc653b4d46be-my-env.e1-us-east-azure.choreoapis.dev/frm/frmservice/v1.0/validate' \
  -H 'accept: application/json' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'api-key: eyJraWQiOiJnYXRld2F5X2NlcnRpZmljYXRlX2FsaWFzIiwiYWxnIjoiUlMyNTYifQ..b9gY9e7X8te7Bi0DvJbSWsWXLkI0FsfwREBy_cVHuIoHCZWXS2fjQihSuYIRJ7J7dNnuwJwlWBoYRxx-xz7d89VilOGwq15Ie3fe53EnKVLqAqB6DEVygh-523j0F7Fg4J7ExtN9YsHJMq02lihSj529NXV9352ABbq_uVQtSNNCs8tjRaFhPli1tYfRiIrI0zsvrhGYgphwL5XSi8Zwc9kePJ4NDM2aKKpoVgDfg8uVyAGVY0uZbD-S1zmTuRzC5LVbHmOnGYNLhV0SuR0YI17iEtv-VvAN19GoVbQWCW7IsZt4Bcp5YU3mJTOj0bZUZ7H_a3aqeO0l6u7H9TnS5QtI0pm9otheun2TGtKhZIRR1r9dYbpAu2Ay2pDTOk36ffGBt_bCBgq1YwOB92aJZtimxYy_s2HWPjLYwY8erUCXDXsfcXxE8d7ouEgLkWMCKZFhLD2znNMG2aUswZGFta_7MkWkVI9j8pzRX0PzWXmVwjqGf7qf5t03UTAuLVKiyNqVdtfNGaKk5V2Zxd1NNrlUKD9QsRAWGQmA5g-y3rgMLX9on2yVd2_kkWlu4Vq7qJxx-24_TpTSHwKkKK7zJA2jQdpnAw-7inbxSIfVnr0Jhj_mxDOL3UzkIOeJJOinGiP7fMyS15M96Pj-kb8C0CPAUUXz-yPdgvuXN0lT-Z0' \
  -d '  {
    "merchant_id": "MERCHANT789",
    "transaction_id": "123456780",
    "status": "approved",
    "score": 90.5
  }'
```
